credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: "Speak No Evil, See No Evil, Hear No Evil"
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: Rectangular, rounded sides and corners, featuring raised decoration of 3 seated monkeys, with hands over mouth, ears, and eyes, inscribed beneath each respectively "Speak No Evil", "See No Evil", "Hear No Evil", all framed by decorative cartouche. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.
name: Matchsafe
